classitems.name: getVersion
example:
<html>
	    <script>
	        require.config({
	            baseUrl: './res'
	        });
	        require(['ea'], function (ea) {
	            var version = ea().getVersion();
	            console.log(version);
	        });
	    </script>
	</html>
